title: Ep51 Pet Crimes
description: This week, the gals chat about pet-related crimes (but don't worry, there won't be *tails* of animal abuse... just murder and corruption!). Cases include a puppy-induced homicide, the rise and fall of an international racing pigeon empire, and your risk of being killed and eaten by your pets. This episode is paired with Winc's Copy Cat Tempranillo, so drop one in your basket, let the dog out, place your pigeon bets, and tune in for Pet Crimes.
